title: The General Solution of the 2-D Sigma Model Stringy Black Hole and the Massless Complex Sine-Gordon Model
abstract: The exact general solution for a sigma model having the $2-d$ stringy black hole (SBH) as internal manifold is found in closed form. We also give the exact solution for the massless complex Sine-Gordon (MCSG) model. Both, models and their solutions are related by analytic continuation. The solution is expressed in terms of four arbitrary functions of one variable. (hep-th 9312085).
